column5: Finally got all the GoPro mounts installed on my boat! It will allow me to film from multiple angles!  Suction cup mount on the side for a "release shot" camera   Passenger side wide angle of front deck   Engine mounted, looking forward at the entire boat   Trolling motor mount, looking back at the entire boat   Angled up looking at the front deck for sweet "upward" footage   Mounted on an telescopic 6ft pole getting a high 170 wide angle shot of the front 2/3 of the boat!
I put one on the center seat too so you can sit on the deck and have a close up to show baits etc.  Mix these gopro shots with a hand HD cam and you got some cool videos!
Sweet
holy cow...all I can say
now you just need one mounted on the net and you have a complete set
are those just mounts? or do you have like 8 cameras setup for each one

Great looking set-up Stoty, but I'm assuming you'll be using a tether strap incase the suction mount pops loose ??  I like that telescopic pole at the rear, does that just sit in the hole for the rear seat ??
hardcore setup.. i hope your sponsered by go pro!! all those cameras aint cheap!
hope you're gonna share some videos
Thats unreal!
That's excellent, it is a good thing that professional fishermen that take video footage never have to pee over the side of the boat though.  I couldn't stand being on camera so much.  Bill
can't wait to see the vid you put together from this setup ! just no crazy jump cuts ok

Looks great i had the same question as Lew are you using a tether if so please show pics of that setup.  I just got mine from the OFC classifieds and will be adding mounts to my boat also you gave me some great ideas thanks.
You got it Lew! It's wedged in the rear seat mount. I have braided line tied around the camera/suction cup as a "safety net".
That's why there's only 1 side of the boat with a suction mount! ;-)
Ok Boat is shiny and I like your ride btw.Cool set up with the cameras but now its time for some fish slime.  I expect a helluva report in the near future.  MTP
I'm hoping to have one! trying to find the time to get out with all the OT I've been doing! Sucks not being able to get out!
need one for the buts of your rods!
hardcore. some real great ideas.
Lots of SD cards, batteries and many gigabytes of footage to edit! Enjoy
Shiny boat, check Lots of cameras and mounts, check Time to get it wet and go fishing.....Nope gotta work, what a bummer dude..Sweet setup thou..Cant wait to see some of your reports now thou!
